titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the achievements and legacy of former Representative John F. Seiberling, and expressing deep condolences to the Seiberling family for their loss.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 9/18/2008--Introduced. Recognizes and honors the achievements and legacy of former Representative John F. Seiberling from Ohio, particularly his numerous contributions to environmental causes and his unfailing dedication to his constituents. Expresses deep condolences to the Seiberling family for their loss.
